actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for the mandatory retirement of judges of the Supreme Court at the age of 70.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the mandatory retirement of judges of the Supreme Court from regular active service at the age of seventy. States that this article shall not apply to any person serving as a judge of the Supreme Court on the date of ratification.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for the mandatory retirement of judges of the Supreme Court at the age of 70.
